Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/33rd
ShortDescription: #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 31st, Cicero, 47th and  Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 31st, Cicero, 47th and  Pulaski, then resume their normal route on Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

Allow extra travel time.
